member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory
member.summary: Factory for loggers

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory.GetLogger(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the logger for the specified type, creating it if necessary.
member.param: The type to create the logger for.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory.GetLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a custom-named logger for the specified type, creating it if necessary.
member.param: The explicit name to create the logger for. If null, the type's FullName will be used.

member.summary: Gets the logger for the specified activation context, creating it if necessary.
member.param: The context for which a logger is created.

member.summary: Gets the logger for the class calling this method.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.LoggerFactoryBase
member.summary: A baseline definition of a logger factory, which tracks loggers as flyweights by type. Custom logger factories should generally extend this type.

member.summary: Gets the logger for the specified type, creating it if necessary.
member.param: The type to create the logger for.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.LoggerFactoryBase.GetLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a custom-named logger for the specified type, creating it if necessary.
member.param: The explicit name to create the logger for. If null, the type's FullName will be used.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Logging.LoggerFactoryBase.GetLogger(Ninject.Activation.IContext)
member.summary: Gets the logger for the specified activation context, creating it if necessary.

member.summary: Gets the logger for the class calling this method.
